name: setdescription
description:
Sets the description for the given taxon. If the taxon name is provided without a description, the description can be provided in a separate follow-up message.

Sometimes, two different taxa will have the same name. If you need to be more specific, you can use the commands `setspeciesdesc`, `setgenusdesc`, `setfamilydesc`, and so on. These commands all have shorthand equivalents, e.g. `setsdesc`, `setgdesc`, `setfdesc`, etc.
